original_text: Israel's people, listen to the rules and laws that I will now teach you. If you obey them, you will live. You will go into the land that the Lord, the God of your ancestors, is giving to you. The land will belong to you, for you to live in.
korean_text: 이스라엘아 이제 내가 너희에게 가르치는 규례와 법도를 듣고 준행하라 그리하면 너희가 살 것이요 너희 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 주시는 땅에 들어가서 그것을 얻게 되리라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people, listen to the rules and laws
that I will now teach you
You will go into the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 땅에 들어가게 될 것이니

sentences.original_text: that the Lord, the God of your ancestors, is giving to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 조상의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 주시는 땅

sentences.original_text: The land will belong to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅은 너희의 소유가 될 것이니
